original_title: 100 Years of Men in Love: The Accidental Collection
overview: "100 Years of Men in Love: The Accidental Collection" is a documentary focusing on a unique, moving and joy-filled collection of vintage photographs of men in love from the 1850s to the 1950s. Taken when male partnerships were often illegal, the photos were found at flea markets, in shoe boxes, family archives, estate sales and old suitcases.
title: 100 Years of Men in Love: The Accidental Collection
